other_title: 劇場版シティーハンター <新宿プライベート・アイズ> (Japanese)
城市猎人：新宿 Private Eyes (Chinese (Singapore))
plot: Ryo Saeba is a sniper and private eye ("sweeper") based in Tokyo's Shinjuku Ward, who possesses unrivaled marksmanship and an over-the-top obsession for the opposite sex. He and his partner Kaori Makimura serve as bodyguards and perform other duties for his clients. Their latest client is Ai Shindo, a model who's being attacked by mysterious people and unknowingly holds the key to a vast city-wide conspiracy.
ending_theme: "Still Love Her- Ushinawareta Fūkei" (スティル・ラブ・ハー 失われた風景) by TM Network
insert_song: "Angel Night- Tenshi no Iru Basho" (Angel Night~天使のいる場所~) by Psy-S
"City Hunter~Ai yo Kienaide" (CITY HUNTER～愛よ消えないで) by Kahoru Kohiruimaki
"Forever in My Heart" by Kirsten Steinhauer
"Go Go Heaven" (ゴーゴーヘブン) by Toshiyuki Ōsawa
"Mikuni no Tōbō" (御国の逃亡) by Lotus Juice
